text: KMPO (88.7 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a Spanish-language public radio format. It serves the Modesto area of the northern San Joaquin Valley. The station is licensed to Modesto, in Stanislaus County, California and is owned by Radio Bilingüe, Inc. ==See also== *List of community radio stations in the United States ==External links== MPO MPO Category:Modesto, California Category:Mass media in Stanislaus County, California Category:Radio stations established in 1984 Category:1984 establishments in California Category:Community radio stations in the United States
title: KMPO
